chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (p q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), incl p q -> red a p -> red a q

Premises:
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
incl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
red = fun (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (pO A n) : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop Arguments red _ _%list_scope
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
CombLinear_trans_cons_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a
reduceplus_cb1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) b
reduce_cb1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) b
reducestar_cb2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)

Reducef : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : poly A0 eqA ltM), {q : poly A0 eqA ltM | reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q)}
order_reduceplus : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p \/ eqP A eqA n p q
ltP_reduce : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p
reduceplus_skip : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)
reduceplus_mults_invf0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r s

```coq
intros a p q Hincl Hred.
induction p as [|b p Hp].
- simpl in *. intros _ _. apply Hred.
- simpl in *. intros _ _. apply IHp.
  + apply Hred.
  + intros c Hc. apply incl_cons in Hc. destruct Hc.
    * subst. apply Hred.
    * apply Hincl. apply incl_cons. right. apply Hc.
Qed.

original: intros a p q Hincl Hred. induction p as [|b p Hp]. - simpl in *. intros _ _. apply Hred. - simpl in *. intros _ _. apply IHp. + apply Hred. + intros c Hc. apply incl_cons in Hc. destruct Hc. * subst. apply Hred. * apply Hincl. apply incl_cons. right. apply Hc.
